patthana15.3:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.3:0.3_0: And the result of past deeds.
patthana15.3:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the result of deeds.
patthana15.3:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.3:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of deeds.
patthana15.3:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.3:3.1_0: There is no such thing as the result of deeds.
patthana15.3:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
